entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High zero.
